name: Vs
description:
Vs is a simplified control traditional 2D fighting game.  No motions for special moves, easy to pull off combos, and reduced movesets make it so anyone can pick up and play.  Select from 7 different fighters and get straight into the mind games!

7 different fighters with unique play styles

local competitive play

5 sprawling stages

tutorial that walks you through the basics of controls and combos

can only play with controllers currently
